User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

On german QWERTZ keyboard layouts the / character is generated by pressing shift + 7.

To toggle the visibility of the add on toolbar you need to press cmd + shift + 7.


Actual results:

It happens that way (add on toolbar is not shown):

1) shift + cmd + 7 => Opens Help > search in the main toolbar, positioning the cursor there
2) shift + cmd + 7 => The search disappears, add on toolbar is made visible
3) shift + cmd + 7 => Opens Help > search in the main toolbar, positioning the cursor there
4) shift + cmd + 7 => The search disappears, add on toolbar is made invisible


Expected results:

Expecting only one action. Either by changing keyboard shortcut for addon toolbar (maybe on german localized version only) or the search shortcut.
comments.author: mozilla@gos.si
